attributes.action: reassess Council tenants for their need for Council housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, Council residents are never reassessed for their need for Council housing. Once they qualify for Council housing, they have the right to stay there forever - regardless of how their circumstances may change. This is a drastic waste of resources and means that genuinely needy people may go without housing, unless new homes are built.
